attributes.action: disabled rail cards for CANCER sufferers
attributes.additional_details:
National rail web site does not allow for cancer suffers to apply for the disabled rail card.  This is discriminatory as cancer suffers are covered by the Disability Act so why are they not in the list?  The evidence you need to supply is things like copies PIP, Attendance Allowances when we know most cancer patients are also not entitled to these!  

Stop excluding cancer suffers from benefits and discount cards
